column2: BRIEF-Proassurance Q1 Loss Per Share $0.41 May 7 (Reuters) - ProAssurance Corp: * PROASSURANCE REPORTS RESULTS FOR FIRST QUARTER 2020 AND DECLARES QUARTERLY DIVIDEND * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE ESTIMATE $0.05 -- REFINITIV IBES DATA * TO REDUCE OUR QUARTERLY DIVIDEND FROM $0.31 PER SHARE TO $0.05 PER SHARE * CONSOLIDATED GROSS PREMIUMS WRITTEN IN Q1 OF 2020 WERE $262.4 MILLION * CONSOLIDATED NET PREMIUMS EARNED FOR QUARTER DECREASED $4.3 MILLION, OR 2.1% Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-ProAssurance Reports Qtrly Loss Per Share $1.10 Feb 20 (Reuters) - ProAssurance Corp: * PROASSURANCE REPORTS RESULTS FOR FOURTH QUARTER AND YEAR-END 2019 * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $-1.56, REVENUE VIEW $216.8 MILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Norcal Group To Be Acquired By Proassurance Corp Feb 20 (Reuters) - ProAssurance Corp: * PROASSURANCE CORP - THERE IS NO FINANCING CONDITION TO CONSUMMATE TRANSACTION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-ProAssurance Corp Reports Qtrly Net Income Per Diluted Share Of $0.22 May 3 (Reuters) - ProAssurance Corp: * PROASSURANCE CORP QTRLY TOTAL REVENUES $201 MILLION, DOWN 9.9 PERCENT * PROASSURANCE CORP QTRLY NET INCOME PER DILUTED SHARE $0.22 * PROASSURANCE CORP QTRLY NON-GAAP OPERATING INCOME PER DILUTED SHARE $0.40 * PROASSURANCE CORP QTRLY NET PREMIUMS EARNED $187.2 MILLION VERSUS $182.9 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
